stories.Title: The future is in your pocket
stories.Description: Rabbit's R1 continues to position itself as the gadget of the moment. With over 50,000 preorders after its launch, the company has revealed that it's partnering with Perplexity to boost its capabilities.
stories.Tweet: The future is in your pocket 📦 Rabbit's R1 continues to position itself as the gadget of the moment. With over 50,000 preorders after its launch, the company has revealed that it's partnering with Perplexity to boost its capabilities. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/18/24043490/rabbit-r1-ai-perplexity-pro-live-search-info-answers

stories.Title: The pursuit of AGI
stories.Description: Major names in the AI industry are behind the goal of achieving AGI, and now Mark Zuckerberg is joining its ranks, claiming that the products he envisions must be built with this technology in mind.
stories.Tweet: The pursuit of AGI 📦 Major names in the AI industry are behind the goal of achieving AGI, and now Mark Zuckerberg is joining its ranks, claiming that the products he envisions must be built with this technology in mind. #meta https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/18/24042354/mark-zuckerberg-meta-agi-reorg-interview

stories.Title: A fellow student
stories.Description: ChatGPT is going to the university, quite literally. OpenAI and Arizona State University have shared plans to use the chatbot as a tool to improve student success, research, and administrative functions.
stories.Tweet: A fellow student 📦 ChatGPT is going to the university, quite literally. OpenAI and Arizona State University have shared plans to use the chatbot as a tool to improve student success, research, and administrative functions. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/19/openai-signs-up-its-first-higher-education-customer-arizona-state/

stories.Title: Perfect for your TikTok
stories.Description: As the trend for generative AI grows, more platforms are willing to give it a try. That's the case for TikTok which is currently testing a feature that allows users to create songs using text prompts.
stories.Tweet: Perfect for your TikTok 📦 As the trend for generative AI grows, more platforms are willing to give it a try. That's the case for TikTok which is currently testing a feature that allows users to create songs using text prompts. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/19/tiktok-is-experimenting-with-a-feature-that-uses-ai-to-create-songs-based-on-prompts/

stories.Title: It's AI news
stories.Description: As AI proliferates online, there's a slight chance that some Google News results may be AI-generated. Nonetheless, Google assures it's infrequent as they prioritize valuable and original content.
stories.Tweet: It's AI news 📦 As AI proliferates online, there's a slight chance that some Google News results may be AI-generated. Nonetheless, Google assures it's infrequent as they prioritize valuable and original content. #ai https://www.engadget.com/your-google-news-feed-is-likely-filled-with-ai-generated-articles-194654896.html

stories.Title: Are you there SLIM?
stories.Description: Japan's historic touchdown on the moon happened. However, not everything is going according to plan as JAXA has just revealed an issue with SLIM's solar panels.
stories.Tweet: Are you there SLIM? 📦 Japan's historic touchdown on the moon happened. However, not everything is going according to plan as JAXA has just revealed an issue with SLIM's solar panels. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/japan-moon-landing-success-slim-spacecraft

stories.Title: Off to space
stories.Description: Axiom Space's Ax-3 is heading to the ISS after a successful launch at the hands of SpaceX. A crew of four astronauts is gearing up for two weeks of space research.
stories.Tweet: Off to space 📦 Axiom Space's Ax-3 is heading to the ISS after a successful launch at the hands of SpaceX. A crew of four astronauts is gearing up for two weeks of space research. #rocketscience https://arstechnica.com/space/2024/01/all-european-crew-takes-aim-on-international-space-station/

stories.Title: Get ready!
stories.Description: The moment of truth is inching closer as pre-orders for Apple's Vision Pro are now available. Keep in mind that this is a tailored experience, requiring you to scan your face to ensure the perfect fit.
stories.Tweet: Get ready! 📦 The moment of truth is inching closer as pre-orders for Apple's Vision Pro are now available. Keep in mind that this is a tailored experience, requiring you to scan your face to ensure the perfect fit. #apple https://www.engadget.com/apple-vision-pro-pre-orders-are-now-open-130056024.html

stories.Title: Alexa’s upcoming revamp
stories.Description: Amazon is looking for ways to keep its famous voice assistant afloat. Rumors suggest the company wants to launch a subscription-only generative AI version of Alexa to boost revenue and attract users.
stories.Tweet: Alexa’s upcoming revamp 📦 Amazon is looking for ways to keep its famous voice assistant afloat. Rumors suggest the company wants to launch a subscription-only generative AI version of Alexa to boost revenue and attract users. #amazon https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2024/01/alexa-is-in-trouble-paid-for-alexa-gives-inaccurate-answers-in-early-demos/

stories.Title: Let’s go to China!
stories.Description: Tesla is bringing a treat for its fans in China. The Cybertruck is going on a tour for everyone who wants to witness its power in person. A heads up, though: it isn't currently available in the country.
stories.Tweet: Let’s go to China! 📦 Tesla is bringing a treat for its fans in China. The Cybertruck is going on a tour for everyone who wants to witness its power in person. A heads up, though: it isn't currently available in the country. #tesla https://electrek.co/2024/01/18/tesla-cybertruck-chinese-tour-available/

title: Rabbit and Perplexity join forces, ChatGPT’s academic journey, Meta turns to AGI
description: Rabbit's R1 gadget is still stealing the spotlight, teaming up with Perplexity to give users instant answers—talk about futuristic vibes! Picture this: a friendly chatbot could be your sidekick in class, thanks to OpenAI and Arizona State University teaming up to bring ChatGPT to their campus. And just when we thought the AGI scene was getting dull, enter Mark Zuckerberg, thinking up all future Meta products powered by this game-changing tech.
